AboutDiagnostics

Wait, what? A diagnostics page? For a static site generator?

Yup! This is just me mucking around a little as I customise the theme and get to understanding how it works based on poking around, one of the major things that I’ve started with is learning how to play with liquid, and site structure. One of the things that came to mind is looking at static files.

So here’s a list of all the static files that are here on the site (sorted by datemod):
